dental_history: Excellent oral health, no periodontal disease. Last dental exam 2 months ago showed healthy gums.

expected_issues.description: Scaling and root planing billed for patient without periodontal disease
Periodontal maintenance billed for patient with no history of periodontal disease

documents.content: 34-year-old female presents for routine dental cleaning. Patient maintains excellent oral hygiene, brushes twice daily, flosses regularly. Clinical examination: No periodontal pockets detected, all measurements 1-2mm. No bleeding on probing. No gingival inflammation. No bone loss on radiographs. Excellent oral health overall. Performed routine prophylaxis. Continue current home care regimen.

line_items.description: Periodontal scaling and root planing - four or more teeth per quadrant
